entry.title: Site Refresh
entry.summary: Today I move this site from a complicated wordpress setup running on nginx/ubuntu to a GitHub Pages static site. I decided on Pelican as my choice of site generator. It is easy to use and relatively easy to setup. I was tired of keeping the whole web server stack up to date and therefore didn't write much. This site refresh means I lose my secure site but ultimately allows for higher availability and speedier access. Hopefully I will continue to add things to my fancy little site and make it look prettier. I have been working more with Solaris, 3D printing, owning and mainting a house, all sorts of things that I could be adding to my site.

entry.title: Under Construction.
entry.summary: I have many things in life I have to do before I can pay attention to my hobbies. I have to work on a logo, making this site have less WordPress branding all over and more awesomeness. Thanks for your interest and I will be getting this site up as soon as possible.
